description: The system monitors your breathing in real time and automatically adjusts the beat frequency to guide you into different states of consciousness:

instructions.headphones: Please use stereo headphones to achieve the binaural effect.
instructions.microphone: If you agree to use your microphone, place it near your mouth and nose. We will try to guide you into a deeper state.

labels.filePrivacyMsg: Selected audio is processed locally and never uploaded.
